  • Classes in com.facebook.stats used by com.facebook.stats 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCompositeCounter
    Tracks stats over a rolling time period (time window) of maxLength broken into parts (eventCounters list) of size maxChunkLength.
    AbstractCompositeSum 
    AssociativeAggregation
    Aggregation operation that maintains the associative property on multiple combinations.
    AssociativeAggregationCounter 
    CompositeEventCounterIf 
    EventCounter
    marker interface: this is required for for any class that requires a generic of the type C extends EventCounterIf
    EventCounterIf
    counter object representing some value over a timespan [start, end) mutable via the add() metthod
    EventRate 
    FacebookStatsReporter
    A interface for reporting statistics (counters, exported values)
    GaugeCounter
    Like an EventCounter but with additional functionality and additional overhead.
    GaugeCounterFactory
    Factory interface for creating new GaugeCounters
    HistoryManager
    This was written to resemble some older libraries.
    HistoryManager.ExportType 
    MultiWindowDistribution.Quantile
